amathya es.bi. disanayaka, niyojya amathya anuradha jayarathna, madhyama palath pradhana amathya sarath eekanayaka, madhyama palath amathyawarun wana thilina bandara thennakon, bandula yalegama yana mahathwarun athutha palathe mathi amathiwarun da, parisara saha mahawali sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam anura disanayaka, mahanuwara disthrik lekam ech.em.pi hitisekara, janadhipathi jyeshta athireka lekam rohana kirthi disanayaka yana mahathwarun athulu rajya niladharin, pasal daruwan, pradeshawasin athutha wishala pirisak mema awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.
